p: Glioma includes several types of primary nervous system tumors further categorized by grade on the basis of histologic assessment and biological characteristics. Treatment options for confirmed gliomas include radiotherapy, surgery, chemotherapy or combinations with the former providing longer survival time (255 days) compared to surgery alone (66 days) probably due to incomplete resection. To the authors’ knowledge there are no reports of reintervining intracranial gliomas in dogs. Herein, we report our clinical outcome in 4 cases.
